attributes.action: Allow Fathers/Partners of pregnant women paid time off to attend antenatal appointments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women get paid time off from employers to attend any  antenatl appointments.
Fathers and partners have to take this time from holiday they have earnt to be paid for it if they wish to attend.
I believe it should be paid time off for both parties,as many fathers/partners would like to attend but cant afford to take the time off work.
